text: Adolfo Lugo Verduzco (24 March 1933 – 21 January 2022) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI). Lugo Verduzco was born in Hidalgo, Mexico. He was a Senator for Hidalgo between 1982 until 1987. He was also Governor of Hidalgo between 1987 until 1993. Lugo Verduzco died on 21 January 2022 in Pachuca, Mexico at the age of 88.Murió Adolfo Lugo Verduzco, expresidente nacional del PRI ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican politicians
title: Adolfo Lugo Verduzco
